name: The Digital CMO
tag_list: chief-marketing-officer, consultant, business-consultant, social-media, cmo, marketing-consulting, sarah-plasky, digital, sales, technology, outsource-marketing, modern-marketing, business-approach, strategy
overview:
The Digital CMO is a consulting firm delivering results in the space where technology and marketing combine.

Economical Approach for 2009: Firms charter their own dedicated digital chief marketing officer to deliver a modern approach to their sales outreach without having to build the competency in-house.

Start-up firms are a specialty: Building an cost efficient marketing ‘webprint’ by analyzing and targeting the high potential market segments and executing a plan to reach them.

Key Win and Transformation Practice: Take existing marketing resources and put into action a plan to reap results by modernizing current approaches and aligning action plans with business goals.
